attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Using the existing laws a publiciy and enforsment campaign nationwide should be started to reclaim Pavements for People. Stopping cars and cyclists from useing the pavents would save money and make the pavements safe again.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
